sentences: Teatri rahvas koosneb näitlejatest ja teistest töötajatest.
context: In Estonian, 'rahvas' has multiple meanings: 1) an ethnic group or nationality (e.g., Eesti rahvas - Estonian people); 2) inhabitants of a particular place; 3) the working population of a country; 4) large groups of people/crowds; 5) certain human groups/professions. The word can refer to both entire nations and smaller communities or crowds.
